Title: From Me to You
Writer: Karuho Shiina (manga), Rika Nezu (screenplay), Naoto Kumazawa (screenplay)
Actors: Mikako Tabe, Haruma Miura, Misako Renbutsu, Haru Aoyama
Plot: A girl that resemble "Sadako" of the movie Ring is being feared by her classmates. She is avoided by everyone.While everyone is avoiding her, the popular boy Shota Kazehaya befriends her, and their love begins to grow.
